sessions.name: Hacker Hours
sessions.abstract: Free office hours for programming help, all skill levels. Not just JavaScript either. The format is super simple: you come, sit and hang out and code, and flag down one of the organizers if you have a question. That's it! If we can't answer your question, we'll find you someone who can, or at least point you in the right direction.

sessions.name: Azure Dev Series
sessions.abstract: In this 4-part series learn how to get started with the Microsoft Cloud, and progress through building Web Sites, Cloud Services, and using Azure Active Directory.

sessions.name: Free Crash Course - JavaScript Basics for Web Apps
sessions.abstract: At the front of the building, press the doorbell for security to let you in. Sign in at the front desk, head to the fourth floor, and we'll be there! Parking is available at the deck adjacent to our building and is paid hourly, $3 after 4pm.
